title: Appomattox Court House National Historical Park: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices       All members of the management staff can be reached at 434-352-8987 followed by the extension number listed below. Superintendent: Robin Snyder - ext. 221 Administration Officer: Jeff Mailley - ext. 224 Facility Manager: John Spangler - ext. 229 Chief of Museum Services, Curator: Joe Williams - ext. 225 Historian: Patrick Schroeder - ext. 232 Chief of Education and Visitor Services: Ernie Price - ext. 227 Chief of Natural Resources: Brian Eick - ext. 228
